---
title: "Scoring Widget"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(rbokeh)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
read_rds("data/scores_df.rds") %>%
  mutate(TextLabel= paste(Tag, "\nUmsatzpotenzial:", Umsatzpotenzial)) %>% 
  figure(width=750, title="CTR-RPC-Scoring Widget", ylab="RPC Score", xlab = "CTR Score") %>% 
  ly_points(Score_CTR, Score_RPC, color = Handlungsfeld, hover=TextLabel, size=(sqrt(Pageviews_Gesamt/20)))
```
Each color represents one field of action:
Green (3) = Underperformer, improve both CTR and RPC Blue (1) = Increase CTR by improving link placements
Red (4) = Increase revenue by optimizing products being advertised Yellow (2) = Increase Traffic / Overperformer
